subtitle: Feedback from team leads I supported to keep systems stable, data accurate, and reporting on schedule.

entries.quote: David turned complex admissions and results workflows into reports our leadership trusted. His validation checks helped us catch issues early and keep every cycle audit-ready.
entries.name: Kingsley
entries.role: Senior Academic Personnel, Pures College of Technology

entries.quote: David strengthened our systems operations with clear runbooks and reliable troubleshooting. We relied on his steady support every intake.
entries.name: Mobolaji
entries.role: ICT Operations Manager, Computer Resource Centre, FUTA
